name: Gun Shot
description:
Gun Shot by Larry

Made for GMTKJam with the theme of Downwell's Dual Purpose Design.

A platformer shooter having no usual controls but you use the gun's recoil to manuever. So the gun is not only for shooting but also for movement.

I was very short of time because I had many things to do within the 48-hours. So there were only 8 levels... :( Quite disappointed. Though I think it was fun though it was short.

Thanks to Andre for the Background Music.
